docs.snippet: KIM-Jong Sok, New York, NY, passed away on December 9th at the age of 87. He was born on January 7, 1927 in Seoul, Korea. He had distinguished career with Bank of Korea, USOM, and Citibank. In his 28 years at Citibank, he started at their Seoul br...
